Package model.weapon

Class Summary
AbstractWeapon A weapon.
Grenade A grenade with a radius and splash damage properties.
MachineGun A machine gun.
Melee A melee weapon.
Portal A portal.
PortalGun A portal gun.
Projectile A projectile, with a damage, range and character owner.
Sword Deprecated. Using Melee instead.
WeaponBelt A weapon belt with weapons.
 

Enum Summary
PortalGun.Mode The different portal gun modes.
Projectile.Range A enum for ranges.
